Name: Tanaya Verma
review: Tanaya Verma has shown a mixed performance throughout the semester. She scored 15/20 in the first unit test, indicating a need for improvement. However, her half-yearly performance was better, with a score of 30/50. Her second unit test score of 18/20 suggests that she has been working hard to improve. Additionally, her extraordinary participation in MUN is commendable and demonstrates her ability to engage with extracurricular activities.
